I have the same problem... any help?
thanks

If anyone is still watching this 2015... Does anyone know of a 64bit webcam lib?  I can't believe it is so hard to find one.  I just want to grab the camera feed and put it in a WPF application, with some other controls on top of it.  I didn't think it would be so hard to come up with a lib.  Surely I'm not the first person to want this.
